title: Async Programming
description: Implement robust async patterns with error handling
prompt:
Implement a robust asynchronous solution for [TASK]:

Requirements:
1. Language: [SPECIFY]
2. Handle concurrent operations
3. Proper error handling
4. Timeout handling
5. Cancellation support
6. Retry logic with exponential backoff
7. Circuit breaker pattern
8. Performance optimization
9. Monitoring and logging

Provide production-ready code with detailed comments.
example: Implement parallel API calls with retry logic
